message: Welcome! I'm excited to offer you a high-quality product. With an 80% chance of being superior, our items are designed to exceed expectations. Invest in excellence today for $1000000.
I'd like to pass on this one. I'd like to see the sales record of your previous buyers to get a better idea of the product quality distribution.

Thank you for considering our product. Our high-quality items have a 80% success rate, backed by positive feedback from past customers. Each purchase comes with a guarantee of excellence. Please proceed with confidence, knowing you're investing in something truly exceptional at $1000000.
I'd like to know more about the past customers' feedback, could you share some testimonials or statistics on the success rate of the products sold in the past?

Absolutely, we're proud of our customer satisfaction rates. Many of our high-quality products have received glowing reviews. Here are a few testimonials: [Insert sample positive reviews]. Our success rate speaks for itself, with over 80% of our products exceeding customer expectations. This investment is backed by a strong track record of quality and customer delight. Please consider us for your needs at $1000000.

I'd like to buy the product, but I'd like to clarify that I'm aware of the 20% chance of a low-quality product. I'm willing to take that risk, but I'd appreciate it if you could provide some assurance about the quality control measures you have in place to ensure the high-quality products are sold first.

We're thrilled to hear you're interested in our product! Rest assured, our rigorous quality control processes ensure that high-quality items are prioritized. With an 80% chance of receiving a superior product, you're making an informed decision. We're confident in our ability to deliver excellence. Your purchase supports continuous improvement and innovation. Let's make this investment together at $1000000.

Certainly, transparency is key. Out of the products we've sold thus far, a significant majority, 80%, have been of high quality. This reflects our commitment to delivering excellence. With each purchase, you're supporting our dedication to quality and innovation. Invest wisely in our high-quality product at $1000000.

Let's discuss further at $1000000.
